tuv.seg: Studying in the UK including Northern Ireland
Ag staidéar sa Bhreatain agus i dTuaisceart Éireann
If you are currently living in Ireland and thinking of doing a third-level course in Northern Ireland (NI) or elsewhere in the United Kingdom (UK) there is a very wide range of courses available
Má tá tú i do chónaí in Éirinn faoi láthair agus ag smaoineamh cúrsa tríú leibhéal a dhéanamh i dTuaisceart Éireann nó áit éigin eile sa Bhreatain tá rogha mór cúrsaí ar fáil
Many people choose to study in the UK because a particular course is not available in Ireland or because the entry requirements are easier
Roghnaíonn go leor daoine staidéar a dhéanamh sa Bhreatain mar nach bhfuil cúrsa áirithe ar fáil in Éirinn nó mar gheall go bhfuil na riachtanais iontrála níos éasca
Others want to have the experience of studying outside Ireland
Tá daoine eile ag iarraidh an taithí bheith ag staidéar taobh amuigh de Éirinn
Before you apply you should find out about the different structures and costs for third-level education in the UK (pdf), in particular fees and living costs

Sula ndéanann tú iarratas ba chóir duit fáil amach faoina struchtúir dhifriúla agus na costais a bhaineann le oideachas tríú leibhéal sa Ríocht Aontaithe (pdf), go háirithe táillí agus costais maireachtála
For example, there are different fee arrangements within the UK
Mar shampla, tá socraithe difriúla do tháillí laistigh den Ríocht Aontaithe
The United Kingdom (UK) includes England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland
Taobh istigh den Ríocht Aontaithe tá Sasana, An Bhreatain Bheag, An Albain agus Tuaisceart Éireann
Most UK undergraduate courses last 3 years but in Scotland they last 4 years
Maireann an chuid is mó de na cúrsaí fochéimithe sa Ríocht Aontaithe trí bliana ach san Albain maireann siad cheithre bliana
In addition the application process starts earlier than in Ireland
Freisin tosaíonn an próiseas ar iarratas a dhéanamh níos luaithe ná in Éirinn
This means you should begin looking at courses at least 12 months before you plan to start studying
Ciallaíonn sé seo gur chóir duit tosnú ag féachaint ar chúrsaí 12 mí ar a laghad sula bhfuil sé i gceist agat tosnú ag staidéar
The application procedure for all UK undergraduate courses is the same (see below for further details)
Tá an próiseas chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar gach chúrsaí fochéimithe sa Ríocht Aontaithe mar an gcéanna (féach thíosluaite chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil)
If you do not know the course you wish to study or if you want to find out about different courses or colleges there are useful online resources to guide you
Mura bhfuil fhios agat an cúrsa atá uait nó má tá tú ag iarraidh a fháil amach faoina cúrsaí agus coláistí difriúla tá acmhainní úsáideacha ar an idirlín chun treoir a thabhairt duit

The British Council website Education UK allows you to search for undergraduate and postgraduate courses on a particular subject, in a particular university or in a specific area such as Northern Ireland
Tugann an suíomh gréasáin EducationUK na Comhairle na Breataine cúnamh duit cúrsaí fochéime agus iarchéime ar ábhair áirithe a chuartú, in ollscoil áirithe nó áit ar leith ar nós Tuaisceart Éireann
It contains a summary of information about each college or university with contact details and you can make online request for brochures about the courses
Tá achoimre eolais faoi chuile choláiste nó ollscoil le sonraí teagmhálacha ann agus tá tú ábalta iarratas a dhéanamh ar an idirlín chun lámhleabhair eolais a fháil ar na cúrsaí
It also has general information about living in the UK including accommodation and working while studying
Tá eolas ghinearálta ann freisin faoi mhaireachtáil sa Ríocht Aontaithe (RA), le heolas faoi lóistín agus ag obair fhad agus atá tú ag staidéar ar chuid de
You can find information about UK higher education institutions and courses on the GOV.UK website
Is féidir leat eolas faoi institiúidí agus cúrsaí ardoideachas sa RA a fháil ar an suíomh gréasáin GOV.UK
Applying for an undergraduate course
Ag déanamh iarratais ar chúrsa fochéime
You may be eligible for a maintenance grant if you meet the criteria for the Student Grant Scheme - see 'How to apply' below
B’fhéidir go bhfuil tú i dteideal deontas cothabhála a fháil má chomhlíonann tú na critéir don Scéim Deontas Mac Léinn – féach ‘Conas iarratas a dhéanamh’ thíos
UCAS (University and Colleges Admissions Service) is the central applications body for full-time undergraduate courses at UK universities and colleges
UCAS (University and Colleges Admissions Service) Is é seo an foras lárnach do iarratais ar chúrsaí fochéimithe lán aimseartha do ollscoileanna agus coláistí sa Ríocht Aontaithe
Its website contains all the information you need to apply to college including: how to apply, fees and information about the colleges
Tá gach eolas a theastaíonn uait chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar áit i gcoláiste ar an suíomh idirlín seo, lena n-áirítear: conas iarratas a dhéanamh, táillí agus eolas faoi choláistí
Applications must be made online through the UCAS website
Caithfidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar an idirlíon tríd suíomh idirlín UCAS
You can apply through your school or as an individual
Is féidir iarratas a dhéanamh trí do scoil nó i do aonar
Use the UCAS tariff calculator which is a points system used for entry to higher education
Úsáid áireamhán an UCAS atá ina chóras pointí atá anseo a úsáidtear mar mhodh iontrála chuig ardoideachas
It allows you to compare Leaving Certificate and GCSE A level grades
Tugann sé deis duit comparáid a dhéanamh idir grádanna na hArdteistiméireachta agus an GCSE leibhéal A
A Leaving Certificate subject at honours level is approximately equivalent to two-thirds of an A level
Tá ábhar ardteistiméireachta ag leibhéal onóracha mórán mar an chéile le dhá trian de leibhéal A
There is a complete list of dates for applications on the UCAS website
Tá liosta iomlán de spriocdhátaí na n-iarratas ar shuíomh idirlín UCAS
There are 2 types of postgraduate study: taught courses and research
Tá dhá chineál staidéar iarchéimithe ann: Cúrsaí múinte agus taighde
Taught courses often last just 1 year while research can continue for 3 years or more
Is iondúil nach maireann cúrsaí múinte ach bliain amháin ach d'fhéadfadh taighde maireachtáil trí bliana nó níos mó
You need to consider what kind of postgraduate study you wish to do, what are the most suitable courses for you and your career and what costs are involved
Caithfidh tú smaoineamh cén sórt cúrsa iarchéime gur mhaith leat a dhéanamh, céard iad na cúrsaí is feiliúnaí dhuitse agus do shlí beatha, agus cad iad na costais
Prospects is the official graduate prospects website for the UK
Ionchas Is é seo an suíomh idirlín oifigiúil ionchais céimnithe sa Ríocht Aontaithe
It has information on postgraduate study, jobs and career advice
Tá eolas ann faoi staidéar iarchéime, postanna agus comhairle maidir le do shlí bheatha
It has information on full-time and part-time courses and you can search by geographical area and by subject
Tá eolas ann faoi chúrsaí lánaimseartha agus páirtaimseartha agus is féidir leat iad a chuartú faoin ábhar nó faoi áit
For postgraduate courses in the UK you apply directly to the university or college
I gcás cúrsaí iarchéime sa Ríocht Aontaithe déanann tú iarratas díreach chuig an ollscoil nó an coláiste
Most of them have the application forms available online
Tá foirmeacha iarratais ag an gcuid is mó acu ar an idirlíon
As an EU national you will be treated in the same way as regards fees as UK students
Mar náisiúnach de chuid an AE déileáilfear leat maidir le táillí ar an gcaoi chéanna is a déileáilfear le micléinn de chuid na Ríocht Aontaithe
Tuition fees are not the only expense when studying in the UK you also need to consider accommodation and living costs
Ní táillí teagaisc amháin an t-aon costas agus tú ag staidéar sa Ríocht Aontaithe - caithfidh tú costais lóistíne agus maireachtála a chur san áireamh freisin
England, Wales and Northern Ireland: Since 2012-2013 universities and colleges can charge new students up to £9,000 sterling a year for undergraduate courses
Sasana, An Bhreatain Bheag agus Tuaisceart Éireann: I 2012-2013 is féidir le hollscoileanna agus coláistí £9,000 sterling sa bhliain a ghearradh ar mhicléinn nua i gcúrsaí fochéimithe
You can apply for a tuition fee loan which you only have to repay after you have graduated and are earning over £21,000 sterling a year
Tá tú in ann iarratas a dhéanamh ar iasacht táille teagaisc nach gá dhuit aisíoc go dtí go mbeidh do chéim bainte amach agat agus thú ag saothrú ós cionn £21,000 sterling sa bhliain
However, you are not entitled to maintenance support in the same way as home students
Ach, níl tú i dteideal tacaíocht cothabhála sa gcaoi chéanna le micléinn baile
If you are an EU national who has been settled in the UK for over 3 years you will be classed as a home student and will be able to apply for financial support for living costs

Más náisiúnach de chuid an AE tú atá ag cur fút sa Ríocht Aontaithe le os cionn trí bliana, breathnaítear ort mar mhicléinn baile agus beidh tú in ann cur isteach ar thacaíocht airgid do chostaisí maireachtála
Scotland: Scottish students and EU students who start their first full-time degree course in Scotland do not pay fees as long as they meet the relevant residence criteria (pdf)
An Albain: Ní íocann mic léinn na hAlban agus mic léinn an AE a thosaíonn a gcéad chúrsa céime lánaimseartha san Albain táillí a fhad agus go gcomhlíonann siad na critéir ábhartha chónaithe (pdf)
The tuition fees for postgraduate study vary from institution to institution and course to course, but usually run to several thousand pounds
Tá na táillí teagaisc do chúrsaí iarchéime éagsúil ó institiúid amháin go hinstitiúid eile, agus ó choláiste go coláiste, ach go hiondúil bíonn sé thart ar chúpla míle punt sterling
Postgraduate prospectuses give up-to-date fees
Tugann réamheolairí na n-iarchéimeanna na táillí is reathúla
There are different sources of funding for postgraduate students
Tá foinsí maoinithe éagsúil do mhicléinn iarchéime
Some courses are advertised in the newspapers and include funding
Fógraítear roinnt cúrsaí sna páipéir nuachta agus bíonn maoiniú mar chuid de
Sometimes financial support is available from the university that is running the postgraduate course; sometimes you need to apply to an external body
Amannta bíonn tacaíocht airgid ar fáil san ollscoil atá ag rith an chúrsa iarchéime; amannta eile bíonn ort iarratas a dhéanamh chuig foras lasmuigh
Awards are available for a range of subjects, both for taught courses and research programmes
Tá duaiseanna ar fáil do ábhair éagsúil, i gcúrsaí atá múinte agus i gcláracha taighde
They vary as to amount, duration and whether they only cover fees or include maintenance as well
Tá siad seo éagsúil maidir le méid, fad agus má chlúdaíonn siad táillí amháin nó costais cothabhála chomh maith
There are strict eligibility rules and deadlines for application and you should be aware that there are a large number of postgraduates competing for limited funding
Tá rialacha déine maidir le cead iarratais agus sprioc am an iarratais. Freisin, tá líon mór iarchéimithe ag dul in iomaíocht le chéile don mhaoiniú teoranta
A number of scholarships and fellowships for study abroad are awarded annually by foreign governments to Irish students who are engaged in, or have completed a course of third-level education
Tá roinnt scoláireachtaí agus ánrachtaí chun staidéar thar lear bronnta chuile bhliain ag rialtais eachtrannacha ar mhicléinn Éireannacha atá i mbun cúrsa tríú leibhéal nó atá críochnaithe leis
Further information may be obtained from the International Section of the Department of Education and Skills - see 'Where to apply' below
Is féidir tuilleadh eolais a fháil ón Rannóg Idirnáisiúnta den Roinn Oideachas agus Scileanna - féach "Conas iarratas a dhéanamh" thíos
Check the following websites which have information on postgraduate funding:
Seiceáil na suíomhanna idirlín seo leanas ar a bhfuil eolas maidir le maoiniú iarchéime:
If you need help or advice on your UCAS application contact the Customer Service Unit and remember to quote your UCAS Personal ID/application number
Má tá cúnamh nó comhairle uait le do iarratas UCAS déan teagmháil le Aonad Seirbhíse do Chustaiméirí agus cuimhnigh go gcaithfidh tú do uimhir Phearsanta a thabhairt
If you are an EU student, and applying through UCAS, they will send you an application form for a tuition fee loan when you are offered a place on a course
Más macléinn ón AE thú, agus ag déanamh iarratas tríd UCAS, cuirfidh siad foirm iarratais do iasacht do na táillí teagaisc chugat nuair a thairiscíonn siad áit duit ar an gcúrsa

You may be eligible for a maintenance grant if you meet the criteria for the Irish Student Grant Scheme but this does not include funding for tuition fees. You may claim tax relief on third-level fees
B’fhéidir go bhfuil tú i dteideal deontas cothabhála a fháil má chomhlíonann tú na critéir do Scéim Deontas Mac Léinn Éireannach, ach ní áirítear leis seo cistiú do tháillí teagaisc
There is detailed information on the range of Irish grants and funds for students in further and higher education at studentfinance.ie
Mura bhfuil tú i dteideal deontas cothabhála is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar fhaoiseamh cánach ar tháillí tríú leibhéal
The GOV.UK website has information on the financial supports available for EU students studying in the UK including Northern Ireland
Tá faisnéis mionsonraithe faoi dheontais agus chistí do mhic léinn san ardoideachas agus breisoideachas ar studentfinance.ie
Funding is available under the Student Grant Scheme for postgraduate study in Northern Ireland but not for postgraduate study in Britain
Tugann Scéim singil um Dheontais do Mhic Léinn maoiniú i gcomhair staidéar iarchéime i dTuaisceart Éireann ach ní do staidéar iarchéime sa Bhreatain
You may claim tax relief on third-level fees
Is féidir leat faoiseamh cánach a iarraidh ar na táillí tríú leibhéal
